scripts.install-all: npm --prefix frontend install && npm --prefix backend install
scripts.pm2: cd backend && pm2 start server.js --name ratl --watch
scripts.start-server: pm2 start "cloudflared tunnel run mytunnel" --name cloudflare-tunnel && pm2 start backend/server.js --name ratl --watch && pm2 save
scripts.stop-server: pm2 stop cloudflare-tunnel && pm2 stop ratl && pm2 delete all && pm2 save
